english.segment1: Would we hear the sound. Of breathing in the dark. Where would be life's spark. Without You
english.segment2: Would the birds ever sing. Would the wind move through the trees. Could I touch the grass so green. Under this big sky so blue. Without You
english.segment3: Chorus: And the sun doesn't shine. And my world stops spinnin' round. Without You. Tell me where else could I ever find. The peace that floods this heart of mine. Without You
english.segment4: Who could fill the emptiness inside. Who would ease the pain in my broken heart. Who would come in and abide. Promise never to depart. Without You
english.segment5: I can't live without You. I don't want to try to. Live one more moment without You
